settings.title: Settings
settings.subTroubleshoot: Check for common issues and solutions
settings.aboutAppDialog:
Version: 1.0.0

Developed by: hctaskiran / Sagredina

This app is a web-based frontend for the PS3 webMAN MOD. It allows you to manage your PS3 system, games, and more.

controller.rotate: Rotate the device in order to use the controller

gameCommands.subReload: Reload game in case of freeze or any other issue
gameCommands.subQuit: Quit game and return to XMB
gameCommands.subRescan: Rescan games and refresh XMB list
gameCommands.subMount: Search for game by text and mount it
gameCommands.subEject: Eject physically disc from the console

internet.subBrowser: Open web browser and redirect to specified URL

browserLogic.failed: Failed to redirect, try again or check for 'troubleshooting'.

cdLogic.failed: Eject failed, try again or check for 'troubleshooting'.

fanLogic.failed: Couldn't set the fan mode, try again or check for 'troubleshooting'.

gameLogic.reloadFailed: Reload failed, try again or check for 'troubleshooting'.
gameLogic.exitFailed: Exit failed, try again or check for 'troubleshooting'.
gameLogic.rescanFailed: Rescan failed, try again or check for 'troubleshooting'.

joystickLogic.failed: Tap failed, try again or check for 'troubleshooting'.

systemLogic.rebootFailed: Reboot failed, try again or check for 'troubleshooting'.
systemLogic.shutdownFailed: Shutdown failed, try again or check for 'troubleshooting'.
